home.why_choose_desc: Experience the future of real estate with our premium platform designed for discerning buyers, sellers, and brokers worldwide.
home.feature1_desc: Access exclusive luxury properties from verified brokers across 50+ countries worldwide.
home.feature2_desc: Our intelligent system matches you with perfect properties based on your preferences.
home.feature3_desc: Connect with certified real estate professionals who understand your market.
home.footer_tagline: Your gateway to premium real estate worldwide

about.title: About ViaEstate
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in finding the perfect property worldwide.
about.founded_desc: ViaEstate was founded in Karlstad, Sweden, in 2025 with a clear vision: to make it easier for real estate businesses and private sellers to connect across Europe.
about.mission_desc1: We act as the bridge between brokers, private clients, and potential buyers by offering digital visibility, marketing expertise, and data-driven insights.
about.mission_desc2: Our goal is simple: to help real estate businesses grow, reach more clients, and showcase their properties in the most professional and appealing way possible.
about.founders_desc: ViaEstate was created by two passionate entrepreneurs with a shared vision of revolutionizing the European real estate market. Together, we bring experience in technology and marketing.
about.digital_marketing_desc: We promote your listings across our social media platforms and targeted channels.
about.property_listings_desc: We publish your business properties on our exclusive ViaEstate platform, where potential buyers and investors actively search.
about.lead_generation_desc: We connect brokers directly to new, verified leads and customers.
about.performance_stats_desc: We provide detailed insights and analytics on how your properties perform online.
about.services_desc: We specialize in connecting people and properties through smart digital marketing and exposure.
about.private_clients_desc1: Our platform also allows private individuals to list their own properties. From there, brokers can claim and assist these listings — helping private sellers get professional support to close their deals faster.
about.private_clients_desc2: This feature creates new opportunities for both sides — private clients gain professional help, and brokers gain new potential listings.

work_with_us.title: Work With Us
work_with_us.subtitle: Join our network of trusted real estate professionals.
work_with_us.intro: ViaEstate is a modern real estate platform that helps brokers grow their business. We offer tools and services that make it easier to reach customers, market properties, and streamline your daily work as a real estate broker.
work_with_us.broker_grow_desc: We offer a modern platform that helps real estate brokers reach more customers and streamline their business. With our network, you get access to thousands of potential buyers and sellers.
work_with_us.international_reach_desc: Through our global network, you can market properties to buyers from around the world. We handle multilingual content and internationalization for you.
work_with_us.mobile_app_desc: We are developing a modern app that will make it even easier to manage your properties and contacts. Designed to save time and increase efficiency.
work_with_us.booking_system_desc: A new booking system is under development that will allow you to schedule viewings, manage meetings, and follow up with potential customers directly in the platform.
work_with_us.contact_desc: Contact us today to discuss how we can help you grow your brokerage business. We'll help you find the right solution for your needs.

ai.assistant_desc: Let our advanced AI help you find the perfect property or connect with the right agencies for your real estate needs across Europe.
ai.smart_matching_desc: AI analyzes your preferences to find perfect properties across Europe
ai.agency_finder_desc: Connect with verified agencies specialized in your target market
ai.market_intelligence_desc: Get AI-powered insights on property values and market trends
ai.recommendations_desc: Receive tailored suggestions based on your search history
ai.property_placeholder: Describe your ideal property... (e.g., 'I'm looking for a 3-bedroom villa near the beach in Spain with a budget of €1M')
ai.agency_placeholder: What kind of agency are you looking for... (e.g., 'I need an agency specializing in luxury properties in France')
ai.no_results: No properties found matching your criteria. Try adjusting your search.
ai.placeholder: Ask about properties, locations, or real estate...
